snippet: A Spanish nursing assistant infected with Ebola after treating missionary priests with the disease repatriated from West Africa has managed to beat it after nearly two weeks of treatment in Madrid and has no traces of the virus in her bloodstream,...

headline.print_headline: Spaniard With Ebola Beats the Disease, Test Shows
headline.main: Spaniard With Ebola Beats the Disease, Test Shows

lead_paragraph: A Spanish nursing assistant infected with Ebola after treating missionary priests with the disease repatriated from West Africa has managed to beat it after nearly two weeks of treatment in Madrid and has no traces of the virus in her bloodstream, according to test results released Sunday night by Spain's government.
